name: sharex-upload-server
description: A lightweight ShareX upload server in Node.js

scripts.generate-key: node -e "const key = require('crypto').randomBytes(32).toString('hex'); require('fs').writeFileSync('./config.json', JSON.stringify({ ...require('./config.json'), key }, '', '  ')); console.log('Here\'s your key:', key);"

author: aetheryx
